pageProduct.name: Schwarzkopf Extra Care Bio-Tech Repair Shampoo 500ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Schwarzkopf Bio-Tech Repair Regenerating Shampoo repairs & regenerates. Strengthens hair up to 90% (When used in conjunction with Schwarzkopf Extra Care BIO-TECH Repair Conditioner).

Powered by the science of nature, BIO-TECH REPAIR SHAMPOO provides special care to repair and regenerate damage-prone, fragile hair, strengthening hair by up to 90% (When used in conjunction with Schwarzkopf Extra Care BIO-TECH Repair Conditioner).

The BIO-TECH REPAIR range with PHYTO-STEM CELLS and ROSE WATER specifically serves the needs of fragile hair, regenerating from roots to ends.

BIO-TECH by Extra Care formulas with LIQUID KERATIN help repair existing damage and fortify the cell structure for future damage prevention.

+ Phyto-stem cells.
+ Rose water.
+ Apricot kernel oil.
+ Liquid keratin.

- Artificial colourants.
- Silicone.
- Parabens Mineral oils.
- SLS.
- EDTA.

Size: 500mL

Hair Type: Damage-prone, fragile hair

Ingredients

Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Malus Domestica Fruit Cell Culture Extract, Rosa Damascena Flower Water, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Prunus Armeniaca Kernel Oil, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Hydroxide, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Citric Acid, Glycol Distearate, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Sodium Benzoate, Propylene Glycol, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol, Parfum, Bentyl Alcohol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Citronellol, Geraniol, Alpha- Isomethyl lonone, Cocamide MEA, PEG-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, Polyquaternium-10, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor oil, Laureth-4, PEG-120 Methyl Glucose Dioleate.

Directions

Massage gently into wet hair. Rinse thoroughly and repeat if necessary.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
